title: Episode  31 - French Indo China War 1951-1954
itunes:author: The History of the Cold War Podcast
itunes:summary: In this episode the war in Indo-China intensifies. A new French general arrives to take command and the fighting escalates. What really happened at Dien Bien Phu ? How close did the Americans come to using atomic bombs to save the French and how did the French ultimately lose the war ?
itunes:subtitle: In this episode the war in Indo-China intensifiesâ€¦
